column5: In my earlier post- somebody said to fish Reed for 'eyes'. Our group goes to Iskwasum. Is it as good or should we go the extra km. to Reed?

Both are good. Iskwasum opens June 1 and if weather is blowing, it is a safe choice. Reed is a large lake but produces some great walleye catches. Just be careful if weather "blows up". Have a safe trip.
I have had equal luck on both bodies of water for walleyes, but Reed has the added bonus of nice lakers.
